patterns: I need a replacement campus card?
I lost my student ID card and i need to replace it
I need to get a replacement for my lost student card
kindly direct me how to replace my student campus card
I lost my student identification card and need a replacement
how can I replace my campus card
replacement campus card
replace my student id card
responses: To replace a lost or damaged card, please order a new one using this link: https://eshop.solent.ac.uk/product-catalogue/student-services/student-hub-funding-services

patterns: Necesito una tarjeta de campus de reemplazo

tenga la amabilidad de indicarme cómo reemplazar mi tarjeta de campus de estudiante
Perdí mi tarjeta de identificación de estudiante y necesito un reemplazo
responses: Para reemplazar una tarjeta perdida o dañada, solicite una nueva utilizando este enlace: https://eshop.solent.ac.uk/product-catalogue/student-services/student-hub-funding-services

patterns: I would like to book a time to talk a student adviser
I need advice, who can help
I will need a student support personnel
I want  to speak with a student support officer
I need help from student advice team
how do I book time to speak with an adviser in the hub
I need to speak with someone in the student hub
how do I speak with someone in the student hub
I need some help
responses: If you need a student advisor please email student.hub@solent.ac.uk

patterns: Me gustaria reservar un tiempo para hablar con una consejera estudiantil
Necesito consejo, quien me puede ayudar
Necesitare un personal de apoyo estudiantil
Quiero hablar con un oficial de apoyo estudiantil
Necesito ayuda del equipo de asesoramiento estudiantil
responses: Si necesita un asesor estudiantil, envie un correo electronico student.hub@solent.ac.uk

patterns: I need more time to submit my assessment, what do i do
where can i request an assessment submission extension
I need an extension for my assignment submission
how can i get more time to submit my assignment
I've been unwell and can't submit my work
how do i apply for extenuation for my assessment
I can't submit my work on time
responses: To apply for an extension or to defer an assessment to the next available opportunity, visit https://students.solent.ac.uk/studying/attendance-monitoring/extenuating-circumstances

patterns: Necesito mas tiempo para enviar mi evaluacion, que hago?
Donde puedo solicitar una extension de envio de evaluacion?
Necesito extension para la entrega de mi tarea
Como puedo obtener mas tiempo para enviar mi tarea?
Como solicito una atenuacion para mi evaluacion?
responses: Para solicitar una extensión o diferir una evaluación para la próxima oportunidad disponible, visite https://students.solent.ac.uk/studying/attendance-monitoring/extenuating-circumstances

patterns: I need a letter confirming I am a student
i need student confirmation letter
where can i get a letter that confirms i am a student
how can i get a letter confirming i'm a student
direction to get student confirmation letter
I need a letter for my bank
I need a letter for council tax
responses: You can get a letter to confirm you're a student using the following link: https://to-whom-it-may-concern.app.solent.ac.uk

patterns: Necesito una carta que confirme que soy estudiante
Necesito carta de confirmación de estudiante
Dónde puedo obtener una carta que confirme que soy estudiante?
Cómo puedo obtener una carta de confirmación de estudiante?
dirección para obtener la carta de confirmación del estudiante
responses: Puede obtener una carta para confirmar que es un estudiante utilizando el siguiente enlace: https://to-whom-it-may-concern.app.solent.ac.uk

patterns: I need help enrolling on my course
i am a new student and i want to register my courses
where can i go to register my courses
how can i enrol my new courses
responses: For new students contact Admissions team on admissions@solent.ac.uk or 023 8201 5066. If you're a returning student please use the Student Registration app for course registration, if you have any queries about this please contact Student Registry on student.registry@solent.ac.uk or 023 8201 5023

patterns: Necesito ayuda para inscribirme en mi curso
soy un estudiante nuevo y quiero registrar mis cursos
donde puedo ir para registrar mis cursos
como puedo inscribir mis nuevos cursos
responses: Para nuevos estudiantes, comuníquese con el equipo de Admisiones en admissions@solent.ac.uk or 023 8201. Si es un estudiante que regresa, use la aplicación de registro de estudiantes para registrarse en el curso, si tiene alguna consulta al respecto, comuníquese con el registro de estudiantes en student.registry@solent.ac.uk o 023 8201 5023

patterns: I'm worried about my mental health, what can i do
I'm struggling with my mental health
What mental health support do you offer
I have personal issues affecting my mental health
How do I book an appointment with a mental health adviser
I would like to book an appointment with a mental health adviser
I need a counsellor
I cannot attend the mental health appointment I have booked
responses: To book an appointment with someone in the mental health team please complete the self-referral form on the following page, https://students.solent.ac.uk/student-hub/mental-health-support, this page also contains information about self-help resources and contact details for the Therapy and Mental Health team

patterns: Estoy preocupado por mi salud mental, qué puedo hacer?
Qué apoyo de salud mental ofrecen?
Tengo problemas personales que afectan mi salud mental
Cómo reservo una cita con un asesor de salud mental?
Me gustaría reservar una cita con un asesor de salud mental
Necesito un consejero
No puedo asistir a la cita de salud mental que he reservado
responses: Para reservar una cita con alguien del equipo de salud mental, complete el formulario de autorreferencia en la página siguiente, https://students.solent.ac.uk/student-hub/mental-health-support, esta página también contiene información sobre recursos de autoayuda y datos de contacto del equipo de Terapia y Salud Mental

patterns: How do I apply for a student loan?
Who should I contact if I have a problem with my student loan?
payment terms
responses: For student loan issues we recommend phoning your student funding body directly or email student.funding@solent.ac.uk

patterns: Cómo solicito un préstamo para estudiantes?
A quién debo contactar si tengo un problema con mi préstamo estudiantil?
términos de pago
responses: Para problemas de préstamos estudiantiles, recomendamos llamar a su organismo de financiación estudiantil directamente o enviar un correo electrónico student.funding@solent.ac.uk

patterns: What University support grants are there?
What University bursaries grants are there?
What scholarship opportunities are available?
Can I get the University Bursary and Academic Merit Scholarship
Am I eligible for Bursary?
How do I apply for a scholarship
How do I apply for a bursary
responses: For information about scholarships, bursaries or grants, visit https://www.solent.ac.uk/finance/grants-bursaries-scholarships/scholarships

intents.tag: Bursaries, Grants and Scholarships in Spanish
patterns: Qué becas de apoyo a la Universidad hay?
Qué becas universitarias hay?
Qué oportunidades de becas están disponibles?
Can I get the University Bursary and Academic Merit Scholarship
Soy elegible para una beca?
responses: Para obtener información sobre becas, ayudas o subvenciones, visite https://www.solent.ac.uk/finance/grants-bursaries-scholarships/scholarships

patterns: I have defer or refer listed on my results what does this mean?
I have a Proceed with deficit as an end of year result after the resit period what does this mean?
I'm in my final year and need help understanding how my degree is calculated
I need help calculating my results
How do i calculate my result
I don't understand my results
I need guidance on how the gradings for results are done, how is my result graded
responses: All enquiries on calculating academic results can be resolved here https://students.solent.ac.uk/studying/grade-marking-and-classification. If you don't understand your results or are worried about them please speak with an adviser in the Student Hub student.hub@solent.ac.uk

patterns: He aplazado o referido en mis resultados, qué significa esto?
Tengo un Proceder con déficit como resultado de fin de año después del período de recuperación, ¿qué significa esto?
Estoy en mi último año y necesito ayuda para entender cómo se calcula mi título
Necesito ayuda para calcular mis resultados
como calculo mi resultado
responses: Todas las consultas sobre el cálculo de los resultados académicos se pueden resolver aquí https://students.solent.ac.uk/studying/grade-marking-and-classification. Si no comprende sus resultados o le preocupan, hable con un asesor en Student Hub student.hub@solent.ac.uk

responses: To register for disability support or help with a specific learning disability visit, https://learn.solent.ac.uk/course/view.php?id=31784&section=0#tabs-tree-start

soy autista donde puedo obtener ayuda
Soy disléxica y necesito ayuda
Soy disléxico y necesito ayuda
responses: Para registrarse para recibir apoyo por discapacidad o ayuda con una visita específica de discapacidad de aprendizaje, https://learn.solent.ac.uk/course/view.php?id=31784&section=0#tabs-tree-start

patterns: What careers support is available for students and graduates
I need to speak to someone about careers
How can I find out more about Solent Futures
I would like to contact Solent Futures
I am about graduating and will need assistance with securing a job
I am about graduating and will need assistance with securing employment
How can I find employment as a graduating student
I need help with necessary information on getting a job placement
Where can I do placement as part of my course requirement
I am looking for a place for placement
responses: Solent Futures are the careers team here at Solent, they can also help with placements and finding part time work, to find out more information about them and the support they offer please see the following page of the portal https://students.solent.ac.uk/careers

patterns: Qué apoyo profesional está disponible para estudiantes y graduados
Necesito hablar con alguien sobre carreras
Cómo puedo obtener más información sobre Solent Futures
Me gustaría contactar con Solent Futures
responses: Solent Futures es el equipo de carreras aquí en Solent, para obtener más información sobre ellos y el apoyo que ofrecen, consulte la siguiente página del portal https://students.solent.ac.uk/careers

patterns: How can I check my attendance on the school portal
how can I monitor my attendance for lectures
responses: The University expects you to attend all of your timetabled teaching sessions. We monitor your attendance. You can get vital information here https://students.solent.ac.uk/studying/attendance-monitoring

patterns: How can I access my timetable
where can I check my time table
responses: To check your time table please check this website https://students.solent.ac.uk/studying/student-timetables

patterns: Which course can I do
How can I find a course to do
which courses do you offer
Can I get a list of courses
where can I find a catalogue of available course
responses: To get a catalogue of available courses to study visit https://www.solent.ac.uk/courses?studyLevels=courseUndergraduate and https://www.solent.ac.uk/courses?studyLevels=coursePostgraduate
If you know broadly which subject you are looking to study but can't decide on a specific course, our subject pages can help you to narrow down your options. https://www.solent.ac.uk/subjects

patterns: I am coming to the university soon and need help with accommodation
How can I secure accommodation
Which student’s accommodations are available
responses: It’s important that you have accommodation in place before you arrive in Southampton, our Accommodation team can advise about the different types of accommodation available within Southampton the following page has contact details for the team and all the links to this advice https://students.solent.ac.uk/university-life/accommodation

patterns: Vendré pronto a la universidad y necesito ayuda con el alojamiento.
Cómo puedo asegurar el alojamiento
Qué alojamientos para estudiantes están disponibles
responses: Es importante que tenga alojamiento antes de llegar a Southampton, nuestro equipo de alojamiento puede aconsejarle sobre los diferentes tipos de alojamiento disponibles en Southampton. La siguiente página tiene los datos de contacto del equipo y todos los enlaces a este consejo https://students.solent.ac.uk/university-life/accommodation

patterns: What are the entry requirements to be admitted into solent university
Can you help with the basic requirements to be offered an admission in your school
What is required from an international student before admission is given
responses: We welcome students from all backgrounds and from all over the world. No matter what course you wish to enroll on, follow this link for more information https://www.solent.ac.uk/international/your-country
